short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An Extension That Improves Your Prompt So That You Can Get Great Answers From Chatbots like ChatGPT

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Promptr is a cutting-edge Chrome extension designed to optimize and refine your interactions with ChatGPT, making it easier to generate high-quality and effective prompts. Whether you're a writer, researcher, or simply someone who loves using ChatGPT for various tasks, Promptr helps you craft better queries to achieve more accurate and relevant responses.

P.S: You can donate @ paypal.me/TinsaeMeseret
